Articles.Content:
I want to post some words translated from english to "Shinaps", the official Kerbal language.

Note: the translations are write in spanish grammar.

He = "Le"

She= "Alle"

It = "Ose"

The = "Le"(Male) / Al (Female). *Yeah, weird stuff, you have to learn spanish to understand this...

Hello / Hi = "Aloh"

Bye = "Soida"

and now some words used in our gameplay...

Thing = "Asoc"

Sun = "Los"

Mun = "Anool

Moon = "Anul"

Planet = "Atenalp"

Rocket = "Etehoc"

Probe = "Adnos"

Rover = "Revor"

Base = "Esab"

Fuel = "Elbitsubmoc"

Part = "Etrap"

Launch = "Otneimaznal"

Takeoff = "Eguepsed"

Orbit = "Atibro"

Food = "Adimoc"

Oxidizer = "Etnadixo"

Space = "Oisapse"

Explosion = "Noisolpxe"

Landing = "Ejazirreta" (This one made mi laugh, it sounds pretty funny for mi argentinian ear )

Astronaut = "Kerman" (Well this one is my idea, i think that "Kerman" is the word used for name kerbal astronauts. You know: "Cosmonaut" = Russian / "Astronaut" = American / "Kerman" = kerbal)

Pending:

Snacks

Docking/Dock

Struts

Feel free to post your translations!

Edited July 29, 2013 by Pachi3080
